sentences.sContent: Surgeons successfully implanted an artificial hip.
sentences.sCn: 外科医生成功地植入了一个人工髋关节。

phrases.pCn: 人工耳蜗；耳蜗植入；耳郭灌输治疗

remMethod.val: im(进入) + plant(种植) → 植入； 灌输

trans.tranCn: 植入， 插入； 灌输
trans.tranOther: to strongly fix an idea, feeling, attitude etc in someone’s mind or character
